title: Thai salad with rice noodles
ingredients: ['Noodle salad', '150g rice noodles', '1 bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped', '1 bunch fresh mint, finely chopped', '1 cucumber, sliced diagonally, seeded and cubed', '150g rocket leaves', '50g cashews', 'Dressing', '1 tablespoon peanut butter', '1 tablespoon mayonnaise', '2 tablespoons soy sauce', '2 tablespoons white wine vinegar']
